verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>"Go<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> for I have <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> that I may <S%H7896>perform<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> of Mine <S%H7130>among<s%> them,

and that you may <S%H5608>tell<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and of your <S%H1121>grandson,<s%> <S%H854>how<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H9412>made<s%> a <S%H9412>mockery<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and <S%H834>how<s%> I <S%H7760>performed<s%> My <S%H226>signs<s%> among them; that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H4970>'How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> will you <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H6031>humble<s%> yourself <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Me? <S%H7971>Let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> Me.

'For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H697>locusts<s%> into your <S%H1366>territory.<s%>

'And they shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H5869>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> so that <S%H3808>no<s%> one shall be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> They shall also <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of <S%H6413>what<s%> has <S%H6413>escaped<s%> – what is <S%H7604>left<s%> to you from the <S%H1259>hail<s%> – and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> which <S%H6779>sprouts<s%> for you out of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

'Then your <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> [something] <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> your fathers <S%H1>nor<s%> your grandfathers have <S%H3808>seen,<s%> from the <S%H1>day<s%> that they <S%H7200>came<s%> upon the <S%H3117>earth<s%> <S%H1961>until<s%> <S%H127>this<s%> <S%H5704>day.<s%>' "And he <S%H2088>turned<s%> and <S%H3117>went<s%> out from <S%H6437>Pharaoh.<s%>

And Pharaoh's <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4970>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> will <S%H2088>this<s%> man be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to us? <S%H7971>Let<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%> Do you not <S%H3045>realize<s%> that <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is destroyed?"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God!<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> are the ones that are <S%H1980>going<s%>?"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "We shall <S%H1980>go<s%> with our <S%H5288>young<s%> and our <S%H2205>old;<s%> with our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> with our <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and our <S%H1241>herds<s%> we will <S%H1980>go,<s%> for we must hold a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3651>"Thus<s%> may the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be with you, <S%H834>if<s%> <S%H9201>ever<s%> I <S%H7971>let<s%> you and your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> <S%H7971>go!<s%> <S%H7200>Take<s%> <S%H7200>heed,<s%> for <S%H9567>evil<s%> is in your <S%H6440>mind.<s%>

"Not <S%H3651>so!<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> the <S%H1397>men<s%> [among you,] and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for that is what you <S%H1245>desire.<s%>" So they were <S%H1644>driven<s%> out from Pharaoh's <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5186>"Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for the <S%H697>locusts,<s%> that they may <S%H5927>come<s%> up on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>plant<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> [even] <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H1259>hail<s%> has <S%H7604>left.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H4294>staff<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5090>directed<s%> an <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3915>night;<s%> and when it was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5375>brought<s%> the <S%H697>locusts.<s%>

And the <S%H697>locusts<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H5117>settled<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> [they were] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>numerous.<s%> There had <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> [many] <S%H697>locusts,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> would there be <S%H3651>so<s%> [many] <S%H310>again.<s%>

For they <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5869>surface<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2821>darkened;<s%> and they <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>plant<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> that the <S%H1259>hail<s%> had <S%H3498>left.<s%> Thus <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3418>green<s%> was <S%H3498>left<s%> on <S%H6086>tree<s%> or <S%H6212>plant<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4116>hurriedly<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> and against you.

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H5375>forgive<s%> my <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H6471>this<s%> <S%H6471>once,<s%> and <S%H6279>make<s%> <S%H6279>supplication<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that He would <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> from me."
And he <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H6279>made<s%> <S%H6279>supplication<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2015>shifted<s%> [the <S%H7307>wind<s%>] to a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3220>west<s%> wind which <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H697>locusts<s%> and <S%H8628>drove<s%> them into the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea;<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he did not <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5186>"Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> that there may be <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even a <S%H2822>darkness<s%> which may be <S%H4959>felt.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and there was <S%H653>thick<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

They did not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> from his <S%H8478>place<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> in their <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> let your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds<s%> be <S%H3322>detained.<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> may <S%H1980>go<s%> with you."

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You must <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5414>let<s%> us <S%H5414>have<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> that we may <S%H6213>sacrifice<s%> [them] to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

"Therefore, our <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> <S%H1571>too,<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> with us; not a <S%H6541>hoof<s%> will be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H7604>behind,<s%> for we shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of them to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%> And <S%H5704>until<s%> we <S%H935>arrive<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> we <S%H587>ourselves<s%> do not <S%H3045>know<s%> with <S%H4100>what<s%> we shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he was not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> them <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1980>"Get<s%> <S%H1980>away<s%> from me! <S%H8104>Beware,<s%> do not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> for in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die!<s%>"
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are <S%H9210>right;<s%> I shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H3254>again!<s%>"
